mapper.select: SELECT room_no AS roomNo, camp_no AS campNo, room_member AS roomMember, room_name AS roomName, room_price AS roomPrice FROM camproom WHERE camp_no = #{_parameter}
SELECT count(*) FROM reservation WHERE user_no = #{_parameter}

SELECT res_no AS resNo, user_no AS userNo, camp_no AS campNo, camp_room AS campRoom, res_in_time AS resInTime, res_out_time AS resOutTime, res_in_date AS resInDate, res_out_date AS resOutDate, res_member AS resMember, res_price AS resPrice, res_memo AS resMemo, res_count AS resCount FROM reservation WHERE res_no = #{_parameter}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM as rNum, r.* FROM( SELECT res_no AS resNo, user_no AS userNo, camp_no AS campNo, camp_room AS campRoom, res_in_time AS resInTime, res_out_time AS resOutTime, res_in_date AS resInDate, res_out_date AS resOutDate, res_member AS resMember, res_price AS resPrice, res_memo AS resMemo, res_count AS resCount FROM reservation WHERE user_no = ${userNo} ORDER BY 1 DESC )r) WHERE rNum BETWEEN ${start} AND ${end}
